name: Writing an interpreter in Go
author: Thorsten Ball
description: In this book we will create a programming language together. We'll start with 0 lines of code and end up with a fully working interpreter for the Monkey programming language.

name: Writing a compiler in Go
author: Thorsten Ball
description: This is the sequel to Writing An Interpreter In Go. We're picking up right where we left off and write a compiler and a virtual machine for Monkey.
